title: Student Registration Success with Valid Data
description: Verify that a student can successfully register with valid email, password, fullName, phone, and college ID file upload, and that an OTP is sent to the email.

steps.description: Navigate to student registration endpoint
Submit form with valid email, strong password, fullName, phone, and valid college ID file
Verify response status is 200 and contains success message with userId and email
Verify that OTP is sent to the provided email

title: Student Registration Failure for Duplicate Email
description: Verify that registration fails if an email already exists in the system for a student or company.

steps.description: Attempt student registration with an email already registered in the system
Verify response status indicates failure and proper error message about duplicate email

title: Company Registration Success with Valid Data
description: Verify that a company can register successfully with valid email, password, companyName, phone, verification document upload, and OTP is sent.

steps.description: Navigate to company registration endpoint
Submit form with valid email, strong password, companyName, phone, and valid verification document
Verify response status is 200 and contains success message confirming OTP sent
Verify OTP is sent to the provided email

title: Send OTP Resend Limitation and Success
description: Verify OTP send mechanism including successful sending, limitation on resend frequency, and correct response messages.

steps.description: Request OTP sending for a valid registered email
Verify success response and that OTP is sent
Attempt to resend OTP immediately again
Verify error response indicating resend too soon or limit reached

title: Verify OTP with Valid and Invalid OTP Codes
description: Verify the OTP verification succeeds with valid, unexpired OTP and fails with invalid or expired OTP codes.

steps.description: Submit valid email and correct OTP code
Verify success response confirming email verification
Submit valid email and incorrect OTP code
Verify failure response indicating invalid OTP
Submit expired OTP for valid email
Verify failure response indicating OTP expired

title: Login Success and Failure for Different Roles
description: Verify users (student, company, admin) can login with correct credentials and appropriate role, and fail login with incorrect password or mismatched role.

steps.description: Login with valid email, correct password, and correct role
Verify success response with token and user info
Login with valid email, incorrect password
Verify failure response for invalid credentials
Login with valid email, correct password, incorrect role
Verify login failure due to role mismatch

title: Logout Clears JWT Authentication
description: Verify that logging out invalidates the JWT session cookie and returns successful logout confirmation.

steps.description: Login successfully and obtain JWT cookie
Call logout endpoint with JWT cookie
Verify response confirms successful logout
Attempt to access an authenticated endpoint with the old JWT cookie
Verify access is denied indicating logout success

title: Student Profile Completion Percentage Calculation
description: Verify the system correctly calculates the student profile completion percentage based on filled sections and uploaded documents.

steps.description: Retrieve student profile with partial data filled
Verify profileCompletion field reflects correct percentage
Complete missing sections and upload required documents
Retrieve student profile again
Verify profileCompletion is 100%

title: Student Profile Update and Document Upload
description: Verify that students can update profile sections (basic info, skills, tech stack, portfolio) and upload documents (resume, college ID, certificates).

steps.description: Update student profile basic info with valid data
Verify update success response
Upload valid document files for resume and certificates
Verify document upload success responses

title: Student Submit Profile for Verification Only When Complete and Email Verified
description: Verify students can only submit profile for admin verification if profile completion is 100% and email is verified.

steps.description: Attempt to submit profile for verification with incomplete profile or unverified email
Verify submission is rejected with appropriate message
Complete profile fully and verify email
Submit profile for verification
Verify submission success response

title: Company Profile Management including Get, Update, Submit for Verification
description: Verify company can retrieve profile data, update their profile sections, upload logo and documents, and submit for admin verification.

steps.description: Retrieve company profile
Verify response contains expected company data and verificationStatus
Update company profile fields with valid data
Verify successful update message
Upload company logo and verification documents
Verify successful file upload responses
Submit company profile for verification
Verify submission success message

title: Admin Dashboard Shows Pending Verifications
description: Verify admin dashboard correctly shows counts of pending student and company profile verifications for approval.

steps.description: Login as admin
Fetch admin verification dashboard
Verify response includes current counts of pending students and companies

title: Admin Approve and Reject Student and Company Profiles
description: Verify admin can approve or reject student and company profiles and that profile statuses update accordingly with notifications sent.

steps.description: Admin approves a pending student profile by ID
Verify success response and profile status updated to approved
Admin approves a pending company profile by ID
Verify success response and profile status updated to approved
Admin rejects a pending student profile with reason
Verify profile status updated to rejected and notification sent
Admin rejects a pending company profile with reason
Verify profile status updated to rejected and notification sent

title: Company Project Creation with Duplicate Title Prevention
description: Verify company can create a new project with 100% profile completion, but cannot create a duplicate active project with the same title.

steps.description: Attempt to create project with incomplete company profile
Verify creation is rejected due to incomplete profile
Create project with valid title, description, requirements, budget, deadline, skills, and techStack
Verify project is created successfully with status 'open' and zero applications
Attempt to create another active project with the same title
Verify project creation fails due to duplicate active title

title: Company Retrieve Projects with Pagination and Filtering
description: Verify company can retrieve projects they created with support for pagination, filtering by status, and correct response structure.

steps.description: Request company projects with page=1, limit=10, and status filter
Verify response includes array of projects and pagination metadata

title: Students Browse Open Projects with Various Filters
description: Verify students can browse all open projects without profile verification, filter projects by skills, budgetMin, and budgetMax, and receive paginated results.

steps.description: Retrieve open projects with different filter combinations
Verify filtered results match filter criteria and pagination data is returned

title: Student View Project Details and Profile Verification Dependency
description: Verify that students with 100% profile completion and verified email can retrieve detailed project info, while others get denied access.

steps.description: Attempt to get project details as a student with incomplete or unverified profile
Verify access is denied with appropriate error message
Get project details as a fully verified student
Verify detailed project information is returned successfully

title: Student Apply to Project with Proper Profile and Proposal
description: Verify students with fully completed and verified profiles can apply to projects with proposal text, price, and estimated time; application status defaults to 'pending'.

steps.description: Attempt to apply as student with incomplete or unverified profile
Verify application is rejected due to profile state
Apply to a valid project with proposal text, proposed price, and estimated time as eligible student
Verify application response shows application ID and status 'pending'

title: Student Manage Applications Including View and Withdraw
description: Verify students can view all their applications, filter by status, and withdraw pending applications successfully.

steps.description: Retrieve student applications with status filter and pagination
Verify response contains list of applications and pagination info
Withdraw a pending application
Verify application status updates and success message
Attempt to withdraw an application with non-pending status
Verify withdrawal is rejected

title: Company Application Management: Retrieve, Shortlist, Accept, Reject
description: Verify companies can view all applications for their projects with filtering, shortlist applications, accept one application (which auto-rejects others), and reject applications with reasons.

steps.description: Retrieve all applications for a company with filters, pagination
Verify applications and pagination data returned correctly
Retrieve applications for a specific project
Verify list of applications returned
Shortlist a pending application
Verify application status changes to 'shortlisted'
Accept one application for a project
Verify accepted application status is 'accepted', project status updates to 'assigned', assignedStudent is set, and all other applications for that project are rejected
Verify notifications sent to affected applicants
Reject an application with a rejection reason
Verify application status updates to rejected and success message returned

title: Notification System: Retrieve, Count Sync, and Bulk Actions
description: Verify users can retrieve notifications with pagination, see real-time notification counts accurately synced with backend, and perform bulk mark-as-read or delete actions.

steps.description: Fetch notifications for a user with pagination
Verify notifications data and counts are accurate and consistent
Perform bulk mark-as-read on notifications
Verify notifications are marked read and counts update accordingly
Perform bulk delete on notifications
Verify notifications are removed and counts update

title: Automated Cron Job: Auto-Close Projects and Handle Applications on Deadline Expiry
description: Verify scheduled cron jobs automatically close projects past deadline, update project and application statuses, reject pending applications, and send all related notifications without fail.

steps.description: Simulate project deadline passing with open/unassigned projects
Trigger or wait for cron job to execute
Verify projects are marked closed and statuses updated
Verify all pending applications for closed projects are automatically rejected
Verify notifications are sent to companies and all affected students

title: Security: Ensure Unauthorized Access to Admin and Company Dashboards is Blocked
description: Verify that users without admin or company roles cannot access admin and company dashboard endpoints respectively, including verification and project management APIs.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard and admin approval endpoints as non-admin user
Verify access is denied with 403 or 401 status
Attempt to access company project creation or applications management endpoints as non-company user
Verify access is denied

title: Error Handling: File Upload Validation for Documents and Images
description: Verify that invalid file types, oversized files, or missing files are correctly rejected with proper error responses when uploading documents or profile images.

steps.description: Attempt to upload non-supported file types (e.g. .exe) for college ID or company verification document
Verify upload is rejected with descriptive error message
Attempt to upload file larger than maximum allowed size
Verify upload is rejected with appropriate error
Submit upload request without a file
Verify error response indicating missing file

title: Edge Case: Applying Multiple Times to Same Project
description: Verify system prevents students from applying multiple times to the same project and returns appropriate error message.

steps.description: Apply to a project as a student with valid profile
Verify application accepted
Attempt to apply again to the same project
Verify application rejected with message indicating duplicate application not allowed
